topic.title: Furry related zites?
topic.body: i was wondering if there was any furry related websites suck as ferzu or Furaffinity?

topic.title: ZeroNet furry site :3
topic.body:
I made a clone of ZeroTalk for furries if you would like to check it out.
http://localhost:43110/1cQfdZfKPwsHfmKvC5NRmL1Q8eAAmNrSy/

I made one but its just currently a branch of zer0talk

1512495964_16kTteUpdwGCbNpQzcNZvFpEDCdqP.body: psiphon3, you can get versions  for android and windows.  the windows one you can carry arround on a flashdrive and works nicely.
